pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sysprof is a sampling CPU profiler for Linux that profiles the entire system, not just a single application. Sysprof handles shared libraries and applications do not need to be recompiled. In fact they don't even have to be restarted.

use.flag: Build the sysprofd daemon service, required to run the UI without root permissions. Relies on sys-auth/elogind for sd-bus API.
Build the sysprofd daemon service, required to run the UI without root permissions. Relies on sys-apps/systemd for sd-bus API.
